description:
In Seiki, Ki Sho has fallen ill. His son, Shuko, asks Taikobo to meet his brother and Ki Sho`s successor, Ki Hatsu, to determine whether he`ll be a worthy successor if the worst happens to Ki Sho. Meanwhile, in Choka, Dakki`s scheme is still steadily moving forward. Bunchu rebukes her, but at the same time, he can`t allow Seiki to continue to exist now that it has become Choka`s enemy... Deciding that war is necessary, Bunchu heads to Kingo Island, Konron Mountain`s counterpart.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Baisser de rideau pour le vieux sage
The Curtain Falls on the Aging Wise Man
